A Web Dev’s Valentine

Create a heart with CSS and html

.heart:before,
.heart:after {
  background: #cd231b;
  border-radius: 50px 50px 0 0;
  content: "";
  height: 25px;
  left: 15px;
  position: absolute;
  transform: rotate(-45deg);
  transform-origin: 0 100%;
  width: 15px;
}
.heart:after {
  left: 0;
  transform: rotate(45deg);
  transform-origin: 100% 100%;
}
